Articles.Content:
As I forgot to post here when I registered and this is my 1000th post I wish to say thank you.

I want to say thank you to every person who has been friendly in this forum.

I wish to say thank you to Quill18, the youtuber who introduced me to this wonderful game.

I would like to say thank you to Kryten, the awesome bro-friend-awesome who gifted me this wonderful game.

I want to say thank you to Harvester and the Dev Team for making this awesome game.

I wish to say thank you to the community and moderators.

And most of all I would like to say thank you to the RP sub-forum for welcoming me warmly and being friendly.

Thank you all, for being good buddies and friends.

*Grove awaaay!*

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
